conbody.p:
To get started, download the Client Platform SDK from the page or on the Sofy images. The SDK contains basic files needed to use the provided code in the .
.js, .html, .css files to run the sample pages​
.tgz files for package imports​
README.MD contains the basic instructions to get started with code​

section.title: Installation
section.p: Navigate to your API documentation page for the installation details.https://<server name>/sametime-api/docs/

section.title: Supported code
section.p: Contact HCL Customer Support to acquire the code needed to use the platform in your own application.
